column1: #addr_parameter         :parameter definition in base_addr & addr_offset. ex) 0x100+(0x10*NUM) in base_addr or addr_offset
column2: then addr_parameter will define NUM as 0..3

column1: #sheet_parameter        :parameter definition to allow to a sheet overall. this will overwrite the parameter if same name parameter was defined in the sheet.
#base_addr_check_off    :lint off for this sheet to check base address overwrapping with other sheets
#is_packet              :Set this if defined SFR was for a packet(1
